json.text: Hi there! I'm Mark from MarkTeacher.com and this is another high band IELTS
example answer. This IELTS speaking question is all about weddings. How often
do you attend weddings? To be honest, hardly ever. I actually went to my first
wedding last month, which was my sister's wedding. So before then, I hadn't attended
any weddings at all. That said, a lot of my friends are currently engaged and
they're in the process of planning their wedding ceremonies, so I'm definitely
going to start going to more weddings in the near future. I think that naturally
happens as you grow up anyway, I'm at the age when more and more people are
starting to get hitched, settle down together, so that means more
and more weddings to go to and I'm looking forward to it because I really
enjoy weddings - they're good fun. If you want more check out MarkTeacher.com for
more IELTS courses lessons and tips!
